title: How do we get 80+ marks in biology in class 12? - Quora

response.answer_text: I was there , done that. First its not difficult ,and you don’t have to so much practice like maths.we had lots of questions with diagrams like the heart related question etc.. I was good with diagrams and labeling them , so I used to go for questions with diagrams (although most of them had diag) . Make sure you don’t leave any chapter, I know how we study , but at least cover some parts of that particular chapter which you are planning to toss out , may be some diagrams - so you can write something out of it (worst case scenario ) Diagrams, labels and time management . Biology papers are lengthy usually, So write enough but sorted specific Asked points. Don’t worry about the margin, prepare for full marks . RELAX and give your best shot. Good Luck .

I’m just gonna share my 12 th experience.. THINGS TO FOLLOW: Listen to the class properly.. if u don’t like to listen then just go through the pages which is going on the class{ this ll really help us learning the concepts}Read the chapter thrice… i repeat just read.. { as i came across toppers doing this all the tym and the 3rd tym u ll know the concepts just like that.}solve all the past 10 years question papers.. { atleast read the questions with answers. this helps u to go through repeated question as well as u ll be able to come cross all the important concepts}Don’t hesitate to raise questions or ask doubts in class…{ as even ur friends would not know the same and pretend as if they know. this will help the whole class. trust me.}practice diagram as u study. { thats all i guess.. by the way, don’t panic yourself its just waste of tym {i mean it}. all the best.. just do this u ll be fine..}
